title: erroneously placed Leaverbuster
body:
I got placed on leaverbuster because my power went out and when I got the chance to reload the game, it crashed, and I had to restart my computer

I only "left" this game and for some reason I got placed on leaverbuster even though I haven't left any games this week

could you guys look into this please

replies.body: An account will get [leaverbuster](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ) after multiple leaves; not just one game.  Looking into this, I see you've had a few leaves over the last two weeks.  Your best bet to resolve this is playing consistently without interruptions, which will return your standing with leaverbuster.  Good luck!
